description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis - Eliminate Ulcers With Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

What Are Ulcers?

  • 1.Causes of Ulcers: Stress ulcers are acute lesions caused by trauma, burns, major surgery and central nervous system disease.
  • 1) Aspirin
  • 2) Anti-inflammatory drugs
  • 3) Steroids
  • 4) Food allergies
  • 5) Worry
  • 6) Stress
  • 7) Anxiety
  • 2.How Self Hypnosis Can Help Eliminate Ulcers?
  • 1) Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down
  • 2) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude

Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

It is for those who are suffering from ulcers in their body and are unable to get rid of the problems mentally and physically.

It is ideal for everyone who want to heal their general health and improve their mental health

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Guided Visualization Exercise: To Eliminate Ulcers

Lecture7:Summary

Lecture 8:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis - Eliminate Ulcers With Self Hypnosis
